org.afree.chart

Interface Effect3D

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BarRenderer3D

    public interface Effect3D
    An interface that should be implemented by renderers that use a 3D effect. This allows the axes to mirror the same effect by querying the renderer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getXOffset()
      Returns the x-offset (in Canvas units) for the 3D effect.
      double getYOffset()
      Returns the y-offset (in Canvas units) for the 3D effect.

    • Method Detail

      • getXOffset

        Returns the x-offset (in Canvas units) for the 3D effect.
        Returns:
        The offset.

      • getYOffset

        double getYOffset()
        Returns the y-offset (in Canvas units) for the 3D effect.
        Returns:
        The offset.
